snippet: Nadal won his first title in nearly nine months, defeating Juan Mónaco, 6-4, 6-1, at the Argentina Open in Buenos Aires.
abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Juan Monaco, 6-4, 6-1, in Argentina Open, winning his first title in nine months.
lead_paragraph: Nadal won his first title in nearly nine months, defeating Juan Mónaco, 6-4, 6-1, at the Argentina Open in Buenos Aires.

headline.main: Rafael Nadal Earns First Title in 9 Months
headline.print_headline: Nadal Earns First Title in 9 Months
